failed.body+: Unfortunately the loan agreement is not signed or stored at Infocert. We ask you to follow the process again. If this problem keeps happening, please contact the help desk: [{phonelabel}](tel:{phonevalue})
failed.cta: Go to InfoCert and sign the loan agreement
failed.title: Something went wrong signing loan agreement

what-is-infocert.body: Infocert will store the signed agreement in a secure and seperate environment. Storing the loan agreement at a third party ensures the integrity of the document. Of course you can always save a local copy for yourself for reference later. You can recognize this by the following logo:
what-is-infocert.title: What is InfoCert?

infocert.body: You're about to go to InfoCert to sign the loan agreement. Infocert will store the signed agreement in a secure and seperate environment. Storing the loan agreement at a third party ensures the integrity of the document. Of course you can always save a local copy for yourself for reference later. You can recognize this by the following logo:
